channel.title: Comments on: Difference between a Cumulative Update and Service Pack for SQL Server
channel.description: A Technical Community for IT Professionals

item.title: By: Ted Krueger (onpnt)
item.dc:creator: Ted Krueger (onpnt)
item.content:encoded:
Johan Bijnens corrected the CU7 was for SQL Server 2008 R2 that was released April 18th. http://bit.ly/hCYWw8 That was a 140 char issue in the tweet ðŸ™‚

Although, the CTP concept and time base between CU and an SP testing is still there. ðŸ™‚ It’s a CTP vs Production release of a CU still. Not sure I still the issue still.

Now to get Bertrand to explain the code review cycle between those two here ðŸ˜‰
